topic.title: It's the music festival in France
topic.body:
It's the music fest in France. For the whole evening and night, random bands will play scattered in every streets of every  city of the country, to celebrate the longer day of the year. People are happy that night and I have fond memories of what it was like.
This is my home country, where my family lives.
Me? I've been living on another continent for 6 years. Tonight I'm just getting drunk to forget. But it still stings.

1561173102_1L4t7DjepFWwoCcnPSESHrJu591qi.body:
> [h3bhkj5gqz4n3pjm](#comment_295_1CKTRBy9N4RvE3FgeZJpQqFYtLHc37yo11): Don't worry tomorrow they won't be there.

Thank you for listening
